attributes.action: give students at college/6th form a chance to see what it is like to have their own home, by giving them free accomodation for a month.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give students a chance to have life experience where they have free accomodation where they will have to finance theirselves and pay for things like food and bills. This gives them a chance to see what it's like living away from home.
